p.n: Lego Batman The Movie DC Super Heroes Unite
p.k: Batman and Superman join forces with the rest of the Justice League to stop Lex Luthor and the Joker from bringing down Gotham. Animated action
70% Robert Downey Jr steels the show as his metal-clad hero takes on Mickey Rourke's vengeful villain. Superb sequel with Don Cheadle, Scarlett Johansson and Sam Rockwell
69% When a secret experiment turns frail kid Chris Evans into a rippling, spandex-clad superhero, the fate of WWII rests in his all-American hands
A billionaire playboy begins a one-man crusade to clean up Gotham City's streets. Christian Bale stars
Christian Bale returns as the Caped Crusader, battling Heath Ledger's Joker on the streets of Gotham. From Christopher Nolan
84% Christian Bale's Batman battles Tom Hardy's unstoppable villain Bane in the epic conclusion to Christopher Nolan's trilogy
71% A streetwise 14-year-old discovers he can transform into a superhero by shouting one word- Shazam! Action based on the DC Comics character
